Package ro.tuc.pt.BusinessLogic

Class ClientBLL

java.lang.Object
ro.tuc.pt.BusinessLogic.ClientBLL
public class ClientBLL extends Object
The class that uses the ClientValidator class and adds the valid elements in the Client tabel.

      public Client getById(String id)
      This method uses the ClientDAO class to acces the database table Client and extract the object having the required id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the object that we need to get
      Returns:
      the Client with the required id

      public List<Client> getClients()
      Method that extracts all the data from tabel Client.
      Returns:
      data from tabel Client.

    • insert

      public boolean insert(Client client)
      Method that inserts the new client in the tabel if it is validated by the client validator and displays an error message otherwise, with the help of the ClientDao class.
      Parameters:
      client - represents the Client instance that needs to be inserted in the table.
      Returns:
      true if client was inserted successfully, false otherwise.

    • update

      public boolean update(Client client)
      Method that uses the ClientDAO class to update a Client's values in the Client table.
      Parameters:
      client - the instance containing the values that need to be updated.
      Returns:
      true if the Data was updated succesfully, false otherwise.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String id)
      Method that uses the ClientDAO class to delete a row form the table Client in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the instance that needs to be deleted from the table.
      Returns:
      true if deleted succesfully, false otherwise.
